intent_atoms.description: Parser tasks must align validation rules with the new stsc detail model.
Implement C3 tkhd track header parser with flag-dependent field decoding, track duration calculations, and presentation dimensions.
C3 tkhd parser implementation summarized in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/111_C3_tkhd_Track_Header_Parser/Summary_of_Work.md.
Coordinate upcoming C9 (stsz/stz2) and C10 (stco/co64) parser tasks.
Validation rules must be aligned with the new stsc detail model.
Evaluate additional handler type categorizations for future boxes beyond current mapping set.
Future handler types may require specialized roles.
Schedule macOS CLI/UI large-file benchmark execution using R4 protocol once dedicated hardware runners.
Benchmark must be executed on macOS with Instruments support.

functional_units.name: tkhd track header parser
functional_units.description: Parses the tkhd box to decode flag-dependent fields, calculate track duration, and determine presentation dimensions

functional_units.name: stsz/stz2 parser coordination
functional_units.description: Aligns validation rules for stsz/stz2 parsing with the new stsc detail model

functional_units.name: stco/co64 parser coordination
functional_units.description: Aligns validation rules for stco/co64 parsing with the new stsc detail model

functional_units.name: hdlr handler type evaluation
functional_units.description: Evaluates additional handler type categorizations for future boxes beyond current mapping set

functional_units.name: macOS CLI/UI large-file benchmark execution
functional_units.description: Runs macOS command-line or UI benchmarks on large files using the R4 protocol

functional_units.name: macOS DocC generation and notarization
functional_units.description: Generates DocC documentation, notarizes it, exports to TestFlight, and performs hardware-dependent QA for release readiness

functional_units.name: random slice benchmark suite execution
functional_units.description: Executes random slice benchmark tests on macOS to compare mapped vs. chunked readers

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests execution
functional_units.description: Runs SwiftUI automation tests for end‑to‑end streaming UI selection flow

functional_units.name: Combine-backed UI benchmark execution
functional_units.description: Captures latency metrics for Combine-based UI benchmarks on macOS
